snippet.title: What This Neo-Nazi Says About Racism Might Surprise You (The Way You Look At Me Part 3)

localized.description:
The Way You Look at Me examines the growing number of hate groups and neo-Nazis in the United States and the effects of racism on today's culture. This original film from Lisa Ferguson exposes the hidden world of racism through the eyes of victims, activists, and members of the National Socialist Movement. In Part 3 of this documentary, we hear from two members of the NSM, a group linked to multiple counts of hate crimes and murder. Tweet: http://ctt.ec/b6tb2

Watch Part 1: http://bit.ly/1lxPlKW
Watch Part 2: http://bit.ly/1ujcnFQ

Clearly racism is a very complex issue. While we've made a lot of progress, we haven't come as far as many people would like to think. What do you think is the answer to stopping racism and creating a culture of tolerance? Let me know in the comments!

Produced, filmed, and edited by Lisa Ferguson, Nicolas Tapia, and Alta Cutler

Please like, favorite, and share this video with your friends!

*****************************************************
